de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.outlier.intrinsic

Class IDOS<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,OutlierResult>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.outlier.intrinsic.IDOS<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, DistanceBasedAlgorithm<O>, OutlierAlgorithm

    @Reference(authors="Jonathan von Br\u00fcnken, Michael E. Houle, Arthur Zimek",
           title="Intrinsic Dimensional Outlier Detection in High-Dimensional Data",
           booktitle="NII Technical Report (NII-2015-003E)",
           url="http://www.nii.ac.jp/TechReports/15-003E.html")
public class IDOS<O>
extends AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,OutlierResult>
implements OutlierAlgorithm
    Intrinsic Dimensional Outlier Detection in High-Dimensional Data. Reference:

    Jonathan von Brünken, Michael E. Houle, Arthur Zimek
    Intrinsic Dimensional Outlier Detection in High-Dimensional Data
    NII Technical Report (NII-2015-003E)

    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Jonathan von Brünken, Erich Schubert
